choices: She farts on you to get your attention
She summons you to her room
1.content: You open the door and step into the room. You can already smell her in here.

12.content:
You walk into your aunts house and you notice a faint smell. You think your aunt must have let one rip walking by the entrance. The smell isn't too over powering, so you deal with it.

You close the door behind yourself and you hear your aunt yell out. "Is that my favorite (niece or nephew)?"

"Yes its me aunty, I'm here!" You shout back.

"Perfect! Would you mind coming to my room for a second?" She asks you.

"Sure" you reply.



Before we continue the story, are you the niece? Or nephew?
12.title: She summons you to her room

info.brief_description: A gassy take with you and your aunt
info.description:
While visiting your Aunt, you notice that she seems to like farting on you a lot. Oh well. You were still here, weren’t you?
